name: claw-browse
description: Lightweight terminal web browser for PicoClaw agents. Fetch pages, extract links, search the web, and interact with sites — all from the command line. Built on Chawan (~5MB) for minimal container footprint.

commands.fetch: claw-browse fetch <url> — structured page dump (title, content, links)
commands.links: claw-browse links <url> — extract numbered links only
commands.interact: claw-browse interact <url> --follow N — follow a link by number
